meanings.sent1: The unhumbled lion roared proudly in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: She walked with an unhumbled attitude, refusing to apologize.
meanings.sent3: The unhumbled peacock strutted around the farm, showing off its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: His unhumbled ego was like a giant balloon, ready to burst at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The unhumbled mountain stood tall, unaffected by the passing storms.

meanings.definition: Not brought to a state of humility or meekness.
meanings.sent1: Her unhumbled demeanor made her seem arrogant to others.
meanings.sent2: The unhumbled athlete boasted about his achievements without any sense of modesty.
meanings.sent3: The unhumbled child refused to share his toys, thinking he was superior to his friends.
meanings.sent4: His unhumbled pride was like a shield, protecting him from criticism.
meanings.sent5: The unhumbled tree stood tall, refusing to bend to the wind's will.
